title: Why is my 3XL failing to wake and crashing while charging?
content:
My 3XL has been perfect up until this year.
There are two main issues that have arisen:
The device will sometimes crash while charging
Rebooting from this event causes another crash during boot just after the google logo.
Removing the usb-c cable stops it from crashing.
Attempting to wake my device up from sleep proves to be fruitless.
Fingerprint sensor has a delayed vibration.
Double tapping power button to launch the camera causes the phone to spur to life after ~30 seconds.
Restarting the device (by holding power button) is the quickest solution.

Phones are a critical day-to-day device, this is just unacceptable.
